an5.182:4.1: “Mendicants there are these five kinds of people who wear rag robes.
an5.182:4.3: A person may wear rag robes because of stupidity … bad desires … madness … because it is praised by the Buddhas … or for the sake of having few wishes …
an5.182:4.4: These are the five kinds of people who wear rag robes.”
